body_html: Hello! I want to use model files on S3 for TF Serving. Can I use an S3 URI for --model_base_path when starting tensorflow_model_server? Is there any code changes to TF Serving required? (According to the code comments, TF Serving has already supported GCS.) Thanks!
body_text: Hello! I want to use model files on S3 for TF Serving. Can I use an S3 URI for --model_base_path when starting tensorflow_model_server? Is there any code changes to TF Serving required? (According to the code comments, TF Serving has already supported GCS.) Thanks!
body: Hello! I want to use model files on S3 for TF Serving. Can I use an S3 URI for `--model_base_path` when starting `tensorflow_model_server`? Is there any code changes to TF Serving required? (According to the code comments, TF Serving has already supported GCS.) Thanks!
